tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the steps to understand a RAC database and Grid Infrastructure

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Build a DB System
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through building a RAC system in the Oracle Cloud.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Services
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through some of the characteristics of database services.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Application Continuity
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through some of the characteristics of database services.

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Install Sample Schema
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through installing the sample schema.
